titleLines.default: Thank you, thank you, thank you,", "you!

body.default: I ADORE my ethereal kittens. I am sooo blessed to have them in my life! I got Moshi first and a year later, I got Bambi. I just couldn't keep away. I know I can rely on you to answer all my questions and produce exceptional Persians. They are the sweetest cats and are so beautiful with the most loving personalities. I will always recommend you to my friends looking for a kitten!
